revision.text:
<!--작가_정보-->
{{TemplateMapping
| mapToClass = Writer
| mappings =
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 이름 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 원어이름 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 출생일 | ontologyProperty = birthDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 출생지 | ontologyProperty =birthPlace }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 사망일 | ontologyProperty =deathDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 사망지 | ontologyProperty = deathPlace }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 필명 | ontologyProperty = alias }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 직업 | ontologyProperty =occupation }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 언어 | ontologyProperty = language }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 국적 | ontologyProperty =nationality }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 민족 | ontologyProperty = ethnicity }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 시민권 | ontologyProperty = citizenship }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 학력 | ontologyProperty = education }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 모교 | ontologyProperty =almaMater }}
	{{DateIntervalMapping | templateProperty = 활동 기간 | startDateOntologyProperty = activeYearsStartYear | endDateOntologyProperty = activeYearsEndYear }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 장르 | ontologyProperty =genre }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 주제 | ontologyProperty = dct:subject }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 주요 작품 | ontologyProperty =notableWork }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 배우자 | ontologyProperty =spouse }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 부모 | ontologyProperty = parent }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 동거인 | ontologyProperty =partner }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 자녀 | ontologyProperty =child }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 친척 | ontologyProperty =relative }}

	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 영향 받은 인물 | ontologyProperty = influencedBy }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 영향 준 인물 | ontologyProperty =influenced }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 수상 | ontologyProperty =award }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 종교 | ontologyProperty = religion }}

	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 웹사이트 | ontologyProperty =foaf:homepage }}
end}}
 
<!-- Not Yet Mapping
| 문학 경향      = 
-->
